title: Japanese Seasoning Face Test
subtitle: Which seasoning face are you?
description: Upload your photo and discover which Japanese seasoning your face resembles!

privacy.notice: Images are not stored on the server
privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.description: Your images are only processed in your browser and are never sent to the server.

imageHandling.title: Image Handling
imageHandling.content: All uploaded images in this service are processed only within your browser and are never sent to the server. Image data is stored only in the browser's memory and is completely deleted when you close the page.

cookies.title: Cookie Usage
cookies.content: This service stores information such as language settings in your browser's local storage to improve user experience. This information does not identify individuals.

analytics.title: Access Analytics
analytics.content: This service uses Google Analytics to perform access analysis. The data collected is used for service improvement and does not include personally identifiable information.

advertising.title: About Advertising
advertising.content: This service displays advertisements through Google AdSense. Advertising distributors may use cookies to deliver interest-based ads.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: For inquiries regarding this privacy policy, please contact the service administrator.

error.title: An error occurred
error.noFace: No face detected. Please try another photo.
error.multipleFaces: Multiple faces detected. Please use a photo with one person.
error.generic: An error occurred. Please try again.

desc.soy_sauce:
Balanced and deep soy sauce type.

【Facial Features】
You have deep eyes and a calm impression. With well-balanced features that suit any style, your face becomes more attractive over time.

【Personality】
A versatile personality that values harmony in any situation and gets along well with diverse people. You possess a calm yet warm charm and inspire trust. You enjoy deep conversations and become more attractive over time, like wisdom that has aged well.
desc.miso:
Warm and rich miso type.

【Facial Features】
Soft curved features and a warm impression are characteristic. With an approachable smile and a comforting face, you have the charm to reassure those who see you.

【Personality】
You have exceptional embracing qualities that make those around you feel comfortable. With your multifaceted charm, you show various aspects while providing people with stability and warmth. You're a reliable character who becomes a solid support even in difficult situations.
desc.salt:
Simple and refined salt type.

【Facial Features】
Clean, well-organized features and clear skin are impressive. With a neat, tidy impression, your face conveys cleanliness and sophistication.

【Personality】
You have the power to see through to the essence and give a clean, tidy impression. Excellent at removing unnecessary things and focusing on the core, you have a pure and honest character. An essential presence that exerts great influence with just a small amount.
desc.sugar:
Sweet and gentle sugar type.

【Facial Features】
Soft impression and bright eyes are characteristic. With a lovely smile and radiant atmosphere, your face has the charm to make viewers happy.

【Personality】
You have a natural charm that attracts people and brightens your surroundings with positive energy. You have the power to bring out the best in others and shine more when with people. A person who creates a pure and lovely atmosphere.
desc.vinegar:
Fresh and stimulating vinegar type.

【Facial Features】
Sharp eyes and distinct features stand out. With a unique and distinctive impression, your face has an intense charm that's unforgettable once seen.

【Personality】
You have a unique personality and provide fresh perspectives and ideas. Sometimes sharp, but that becomes your charm, and you have the ability to refresh situations. A challenging character who doesn't fear change and enjoys new attempts.
desc.sauce:
Rich and powerful sauce type.

【Facial Features】
Intense gaze and pronounced features are characteristic. With a charismatic impression and commanding presence, your face leaves a deep impression once seen.

【Personality】
Your presence stands out and you naturally demonstrate leadership. With your complex and deep personality, you leave an unforgettable impression once met. A passionate and progressive character with the drive to move strongly toward goals.
desc.mayo:
Smooth and creamy mayonnaise type.

【Facial Features】
Soft lines and gentle impression stand out. With rounded features and a cozy atmosphere, your face has the charm to give comfort to everyone.

【Personality】
Excellent in flexibility, you harmonize well with anyone and have outstanding ability to create balance. With your gentle nature, you ease conflicts and play a role connecting people. Delicate and deeply considerate, providing comfort to those around you.
desc.ketchup:
Bright and passionate ketchup type.

【Facial Features】
Lively expressions and bright impression are characteristic. With cheerful eyes and vibrant atmosphere, your face overflows with energy that makes viewers happy.

【Personality】
You have the power to make your surroundings enjoyable with vibrant energy. Sociable and friendly, loved by everyone, you play the role of mood maker. You have the charm to brighten difficult situations with a positive and optimistic attitude.
desc.olive:
Sophisticated and elegant olive oil type.

【Facial Features】
Refined features and elegant atmosphere stand out. With an intellectual impression and luxurious charm, your face conveys dignified beauty.

【Personality】
You possess refined and healthy charm, with natural elegance standing out. Intellectual and meticulous with high aesthetic sense, you value well-being and balance. A luxurious presence whose value is recognized over time.

purpose.title: Service Purpose
purpose.content: This service is a face diagnostic service provided for entertainment purposes. Diagnosis results are estimates by machine learning models and are not based on scientific or medical evidence.

rules.title: Usage Rules
items: This service is provided free of charge
Accuracy of diagnosis results is not guaranteed
This service may be changed or terminated without notice
The operator is not responsible for any damage caused by the use of the service

prohibited.title: Prohibited Actions
items: Using other people's photos without permission
Acts that interfere with service operation
Acts that violate laws and regulations
Acts contrary to public order and morals

copyright.title: Copyright
copyright.content: Copyright of the service content (illustrations, text, etc.) belongs to the operator. Personal sharing of diagnosis results is permitted, but commercial use and unauthorized reproduction are prohibited.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
disclaimer.content: This service is provided 'as is,' and the operator makes no warranties regarding the completeness, accuracy, or usefulness of the service. Users use this service at their own risk.
